import React from "react"; class AddEventForm extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { eventname: "", description: "", time: "", date: "", location: "", eligibility: "" }; this.onTextChangeHandler = this.onTextChangeHandler.bind(this); } onTextChangeHandler(event) { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); } render() { return (
Cancel
); } } export default AddEventForm;
